name: Age of Empires II: Forgotten Empires
name_original: Age of Empires II: Forgotten Empires
description:
Age of Empires II: Forgotten Empires is a strategy game developed by Bert “Cysion” Beeckman. It came out on 29-12-2012. It was published by Bert “Cysion” Beeckman. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play Age of Empires II: Forgotten Empires on PC.
